channel.title: goal on PLA Cycling Log
channel.description: Recent content in goal on PLA Cycling Log

item.title: 10,000 Miles in 2019
item.description: Today I met my goal of 10,000 miles riding my bicycles in 2019. Feels good. 585 hours of good old fashioned fun. Not sure what my goal will be for 2020. Probably won’t be distance related. Commute this morning was 21 miles in the twenties. The lowest temperature was 25℉. Chilly for this southern boy. Ride on. ☮
